name: Ancient Gifts
description:
Under the theme "All Glisten is not gold" submitted to GamDev.TV 2021 game jam

The treasure hunter traverse the universe in order to find valuable relics, Once he stump upon a gossip about glittering ruin where nobody dare to enter he then smug and talk to himself. "This must be pretty interesting" Before he finished the drink and walk out of the bar.

When the treasure hunter entered there was nothing but empty corridor. While walking he mumble to himself "It's dangerous, they said. It feels like an open jaw of monster, they said. hehehehehehehehe" the treasure hunter giggle at those words.

At the end of the corridor there is some kind of object that's glittering and emitting subtle beautiful light attracting the treasure hunter toward it. There is only a narrow space between him and this gorgeous object in front of him, only reaching out a little more he would touch it and he is so desired to rub it.

The treasure hunter reaching his hand out for the object, the closer it get the sweet and fulfilling fragrance absorbing into his body. He feels like everything is in slow motion both his hand and the light emitting from the object.

When the hand touch this object a sudden surge of overwhelming feeling transfering into his body, the treasure hunter feel like nauseating and his vision getting blurry to the point that he can't see anything.

After a while he wake up and found himself in a place he's not familiar, the glittering ceiling and walls become out of world compared to what he saw. The object he was after is nowhere to be found and only an ominous feeling from the only corridor he see in front of him give out an invitation to doom. "It's like a monster open its jaw for me", he said.
